commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Wow, so this is your room, huh? Nice place!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Honoka, Chika, you can sit wherever you want. It feels kind of amazing having you both come over to spend the night.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Well, I mean, we haven't talked enough, you know? Honoka and I wanted to sit down and have a good chat with you.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: So we were happy when you asked if we wanted to come over to spend the night and chat!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, me, too! I admire the two of you, how you're always leading everyone onwards. You're just really strong people.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So I'm glad we're getting to spend time together like this.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Whoa, a-admire us? You're gonna make me blush! And I'm glad I get to spend the night. I mean, it's like we all get along well, you know?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, you said it. I mean, μ's and Aqours accepted me pretty quickly even though I just suddenly showed up.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It made me really happy, but also a little surprised.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Huh, it did?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: It's nothing to be surprised about, right Honoka? I mean, we've got something big in common.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! We all love school idols.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And we all love our friends dearly!

commands.speaker: Together
commands.line: Ahahaha!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hey, so, I fell in love with school idols when I watched μ's and Aqours' joint live show, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But what made you two get into school idols?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Well, like I said before, I totally got my heart captured when I watched μ's' radiant performance.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeesh, now I'm blushing! I'm glad to hear that from both of you, though.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: How about you, Honoka?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I'm in the same boat as you two. I saw school idols on a big screen and thought they were awesome, so I wanted to try it myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's something you fall into, isn't it? Like, school idols are so shiny, so wonderful, so cute that they just steal your heart away in an instant!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I know how you feel!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I seriously understand that!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It's strange, isn't it? The way we all looked up to the school idols that came before us and pursued the same thing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That'll probably keep on happening.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We went after μ's.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: And I was struck by Aqours and μ's and wanted to cheer on everyone's dreams.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: The way someone joins us in chasing this dream, first from afar...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Then standing next to us...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: ...And runs with us in the same direction. Having friends like that is just so moving!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, I agree. Hey, what do you find fun?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hmm. There's just so much I can't pick!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh?! Oh, c'mon, tell us!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: W-Well, hmm. For example, I started helping out Karin with her dance lessons, and found out she's gotten really fast at memorizing choreography.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ai is quick when it comes to memorizing lyrics, and Rina is always thinking of ways to improve the Rina-chan Board.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Kanata has insane focus when she's practicing and absorbs everything.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh-hoh.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Anyway, whenever I help out the others, I discover something new. Every week, every day.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: So getting to see everyone grow every day up close is super fun, I think.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: You get sappy, huh?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ahaha, she totally is. Ahh, but I'm jealous of everyone in Nijigasaki! If only we had someone like you around!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, I want one of you for us, too!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Us first!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: U-Um, ah, oh! One more thing! I definitely have a lot of fun checking out every group's costume design, too!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh? You've been doing that?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, I try to use them as references for Nijigasaki's costumes. Oh, but it's most important to make sure the costume matches the song!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: *Giggle* Well, that's true, but I think it's important to be excited when you wear it, too. Like, I think if we're not enjoying ourselves, neither is the audience!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I get excited when You starts designing the costumes!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And when I see everyone trying them on, all I can say is how cute and wonderful they all look!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Me, too! I'm not the one who wears them, but just seeing everyone wear them moves me.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I get really excited when I see everyone in their costumes, too!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Eheheh, looks like we all think of the team, huh?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Well, yeah. I love school idols, but I super love all my friends!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah, that's right!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I'm a lot closer to the Aqours members than I was when we first met, and I know that I'll love them even more as time goes by, so--

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You want to be with them forever?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah! And I want plenty of people to know how great Aqours is!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Honoka and I feel the same way, Chika!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! That's why we've gotta take on the School Idol Festival first!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Definitely! Because there's plenty of things I want to do with the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What kind of things do you want to do, Chika?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Chuckle* Glad you asked! Ta-da! The World School Idol Festival! We'll gather school idols from all over the world!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow, awesome! I think that's a good idea!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hm? From all over the world? Isn't that like the Olympics?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh! You're right! Then let's make them make school idols an Olympic sport!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ahaha, that'd be awesome!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey, you think the bigwigs at the Olympics would want to put school idols into the competition when they see how awesome they are?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yeah! Now I'm really excited!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: It's still a far off dream, but I hope that this actually does become an Olympic sport, and school idols who come after us can compete in it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah! So for us and the people that'll come after, I don't want to give up on the first step towards our dream: The School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Honoka, Chika
commands.line: Yeah!
